price: E viste quem renega Nossos sinais e diz: "Em verdade, ser-me-ão concedidas riquezas e filhos?"
arabic: أَفَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي كَفَرَ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَقَالَ لَأُوتَيَنَّ مَالٗا وَوَلَدًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: afara-ayta alladhī kafara biāyātinā waqāla laūtayanna mālan wawaladan
